spiritsExplanation:
The video primarily embodies the 'Soothing & Restorative' spirit, with a score of 0.7. The serene and picturesque outdoor scenery of the Cotswolds provides a calming and restorative backdrop suitable for gentle exercise on a treadmill or exercise bike. The video's description and comments indicate that it is used by viewers to enhance their mood and provide a distraction from negative thoughts, supporting this classification.

The 'Outdoor & Adventure' spirit is also present, scoring 0.65, as the video involves virtual exploration of outdoor trails and countryside landscapes. Its setting in the Cotswolds positions it as an adventure into nature, albeit virtually.

Additionally, there is a 'Flow & Rhythm' element, scored at 0.6, due to the continuous, smooth visual transitions and the option for users to play their music, creating a rhythmic exercise experience. Although the pace is driving speed and not aligned with typical physical activity speeds, it still encourages a set flow during the workout session.

Other spirits, such as 'High-Energy & Intense', 'Sport & Agility', and 'Structured & Disciplined', were excluded as the video lacks explicit high-intensity training or sports-specific skills and is more about enjoying scenery than structured workouts.
